name: Page Template
description: Comprehensive page template component that orchestrates the entire page structure including header, content area with sidebar layout, footer, and back-to-top functionality. Provides extensive slot system for flexible content placement and theming options for different page sections.

best_practices: Use consistent theming across page sections
Leverage the extensive slot system for flexible layouts
Consider accessibility when using banner vs highlighted slots
Test sidebar visibility options for responsive design
Use legacy sidebar slots for backward compatibility
Implement proper focus management for interactive elements
Consider performance with complex nested component structures
technical_notes: Orchestrates multiple complex components into cohesive page structure
Conditional main-content ID placement based on banner presence
Legacy sidebar fallback maintains backward compatibility
Independent theming for different page sections
Extensive slot system provides maximum flexibility
Uses only include statements - no custom layout logic
